title: The News parade: Yanks recapture Guam! Paris liberated!
creator_credit: Eugene W. Castle and Castle Films
brief_description: Newsreel items: 1. Yanks recapture Guam, 3rd Marine Division landing with amphibious tanks going through sea-landing bay suffering a direct hit. 2. Paris liberated - aerial shots of Paris during liberation.
